sentiment_articles.title: Sketchy rumors hint at an iPhone desktop mode
sentiment_articles.summary: Alongside all the rumors lately about a big visual redesign for iOS and a more Mac-like iPadOS experience, there’s one interesting one that’s been bubbling up: the iPhone could get a desktop mode of sorts.  Majin Bu, who has a mixed history with leaks, wrote …

sentiment_articles.title: Sergey Brin just gave away stock worth almost $700 million — but we don't know who to
sentiment_articles.summary: The gift from the Google cofounder worth $144 billion is split between Class A and Class C stock and may have been given to a charity or trust.

sentiment_articles.title: This 15″ Portable Monitor Is 7X Cheaper Than a Regular Monitor, Amazon Is Clearing Out Stock for Memorial Day
sentiment_articles.summary: Wherever you go, you can carry this 15" screen without even noticing it because it is so slim and lightweight.

sentiment_articles.title: Amazon’s Best-Selling Power Bank Is Now Nearly Free, 76K Reviews Can’t Be Wrong
sentiment_articles.summary: Amazon is taking 27% off this item, and you need to act fast before the stock runs out.

sentiment_articles.title: The DJI Power 1000 Portable Power Station Is $550 Off on Amazon, Making It Feel Practically Free
sentiment_articles.summary: A high-powered, all-in-one energy solution is now on sale. And believe us when we say that it won’t stay in stock long at this price
